subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan and which famous monument is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और जापनी में प्रतिष्ठित में से एक में जापनी में स्थित एक में स्थित है।
explanation_en: The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur, and the famous monument located in Jaipur is Amer Fort (Amer Fort). Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a historic palace situated on a hilltop and is one of the most visited tourist attractions in Jaipur.
